author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan, place the onion, pepper and garlic into the pan and cook until softened. Add the cayenne pepper, chilli powder and kidney beans to the pan and cook for a further 3-4 minutes. Add the stock and milk to the pan and cook for 5-6 minutes. Using a hand blender, blend the soup until smooth. To serve, pour the soup into a bowl and garnish with the parsley.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ large onion, chopped,  ½ red pepper, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  pinch cayenne pepper,  pinch chilli powder,  ½ can red kidney beans, rinsed and drained,  100ml/3½fl oz hot vegetable stock,  100ml/3½fl oz milk,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, to garnish
